thread.title: The universe reached down and blessed us all with a new Meryl Streep meme
thread.title_full: The universe reached down and blessed us all with a new Meryl Streep meme

author: Sam Speedy
title: The universe reached down and blessed us all with a new Meryl Streep meme
text:
Cherished actress, political activist, wonderful eye-roller: Meryl Streep is a woman of many cultural roles. Now, she joins the ranks of other greats as a big, bright, beautiful meme.
An old picture from the 2015 SAG awards shows the inimitable actor shouting through closed hands. The internet wisely chose to use this pic as a way to shout out the things they most want to shout.
"Bill Nye the Science Guy!"
The whole classroom: BILL BILL BILL BILL BILL pic.twitter.com/QPWzikhdeH
— Kylo Ryan (@RynoOstar) March 19, 2017
SEE ALSO: 'Deal with it' reporter is everyone's new favorite reaction GIF
Fave songs everywhere are getting a Meryl accompaniment.
The Killers: It started out with a kiss, how did it end up like this?
Me: IT WAS ONLY A KISS IT WAS ONLY A KISS pic.twitter.com/pDsShTLWzc
— erika is okay. (@erikaofthestate) March 19, 2017
Really, Meryl is channeling all of us at our first big tween concert.
Britney: my loneliness is killin me
Me: AND I!
Britney: I must confess, I still believe
Me: STILL BELIEVE! pic.twitter.com/VSvdcsepKK
— EMANUEL (@blingspice) March 18, 2017
So. Pure.
DJ at middle school dance: TO THE WINDOWWWW
154 7th graders: TO THE WALL pic.twitter.com/Vr7nukvUAD
— Caro (@socarolinesays) March 19, 2017
It's truly an all purpose meme, relevant to teens and drunk wedding attendees alike.
Dj Casper: FREEZE!
Everyone: EVERYBODY CLAP YOUR HANDS #MerylStreep #Memes pic.twitter.com/R3gVHA28yK
— Justin Waite (@justinwaite17) March 20, 2017
It's bringing back some of the biggest bangers of all time. Stanley Steemer theme still rides.
call 1-800-Steemer
me: STANLEY STEEMER GETS CARPET CLEANER pic.twitter.com/mqywSvNIYU
— mama mia (@miapereiraa) March 20, 2017
meryl streep: mamma mia
me: HERE I GO AGAIN pic.twitter.com/ZBZlLT0XPr
— sewer sidal (@NATALlAROMAN0VA) March 19, 2017
Meryl Streep is probably not spending a lot (read: any) of time scouring night Twitter for memes of herself, but it's nice thinking that somewhere out there in a mid-century modern furnished sitting room, she's looking at an iPad and giggling.
WATCH: This mug solves the worst thing about coffee
